title.rendered: Cinnamon Air Head Office: Ticket Booking and Fleet

content.rendered:
Saffron Aviation, DBA Cinnamon Air is a Sri Lankan domestic airline, operating from a dedicated terminal at the Bandaranaike International Airport, Colombo to destinations around Sri Lanka. It commenced its daily scheduled operation in July 2013. Cinnamon Air’s fleet consists of two Cessna 208 Amphibian aircraft (seating eight passengers each) and one wheeled Cessna 208B Grand Caravan (seating 8 passengers in an executive configuration) that gives Cinnamon Air the flexibility to operate from any of the domestic and international airports as well as from waterdromes in Sri Lanka. Saffron Aviation (Pvt) Ltd. which manages Cinnamon Air is a joint venture between John Keells Holdings PLC (JKH), MMBL Leisure Holdings (Pvt) Ltd., and Phoenix Ventures Limited.

 

Cinnamon Air Address : Saffron Aviation (Pvt) Ltd,, No 11,York Street,Colombo 01,Sri Lanka.

Phone : +94 11 2 475 475

Fax : +94 11 2 440 738

Email : sales@cinnamonair.com

Cinnamon Air Official website : https://www.cinnamonair.com/

Types of Planes / Air craft available with Bluebird Airways

  • Cessna 208B

Cinnamon Air Baggage Allowance

Cinnamon Airs Baggage Allowance

View Cinnamon Air Hand | Cabin baggage, Checked baggage, Excess baggage charges, over weight baggage charges, over size baggage charges in the above link.

Cinnamon Air Special Assistance Services :

Travelling while pregnant in Cinnamon Air : 

Pregnant women have no restrictions for to travel in Cinnamon Air. However, please consult your doctor to determine if flying in unpressurised aircraft is safe for you and your expected.

Travelling with pet in Cinnamon Air :

For more details visit : https://www.cinnamonair.com/before-you-fly/useful-information.html

Queries handled by Cinnamon Air Customer care:

Schedule, eBooking, Rescheduling, Track and Trace, Charter Service Queries, Trucking service Queries, e-claims Flight Information, Missing Luggage, Delayed Flights. Pharma, pets, valuable, perishable goods and extra care shipment queries.

Is there any problem / complaint with reaching the Cinnamon Air, Sri Lanka Address or Phone number? Please report any issues using the below comment form.

Rate your experience with the Cinnamon Air, Sri Lanka : (click on the stars below)
